earthquake.title: Earthquake Crisis
earthquake.story: A 7.2 magnitude earthquake struck the island. Cell towers are down, rumors are spreading. The public is in fear. **Mission**: Restore communication networks, control misinformation, and balance safety with freedom.

advisors.name: Security Expert
advisors.text: Social media is creating panic. Slow it down and remove misinformation! ‚úÖ Chaos decreases ‚ùå Some may feel surveilled

advisors.name: Legal Advisor
advisors.text: Prioritize emergency internet traffic only. Broadcast aid points everywhere. ‚úÖ Safe and calm public ‚ùå Slower process

advisors.name: Political Advisor
advisors.text: Open an 'information screen'. Share aid locations. Correct misinformation. ‚úÖ Trust increases ‚ùå Organization takes time

advisors.name: IT Specialist
advisors.text: Send mass SMS, reach public via emergency platforms. ‚úÖ Coordination increases ‚ùå Technical issues may arise

action_cards.name: Active Social Media Intervention
action_cards.tooltip:
Slow down social media, apply broad surveillance. Remove misinformation quickly.
Pros (+): Chaos reduces fast, coordination increases
Cons (‚àí): Sense of freedom decreases

action_cards.name: Collaborate with Platforms
action_cards.tooltip:
Track misinformation spread, collaborate with platforms.
Pros (+): Public feels safe, freedom not heavily impacted
Cons (‚àí): Effect is a bit slow

action_cards.name: Awareness Campaign
action_cards.tooltip:
Educate public on earthquakes and media literacy.
Pros (+): Long-term conscious public, freedom-friendly
Cons (‚àí): Slow effect, no immediate results

earthquake.immediate_text: Your choice is active: {}. Search and rescue coordination improved by 30%. Some people still have internet access issues.
earthquake.delayed_text: Looting rumors decreased by 60%; aid distribution organized. Some citizens uncomfortable with surveillance.

forest_fire.title: Forest Fire
forest_fire.story: A large forest fire broke out. False evacuation maps are circulating on social media. **Mission**: Ensure safety and deliver correct information while protecting freedoms.

advisors.name: Security Expert
advisors.text: Restrict social media in the area, close accounts sharing fake maps. ‚úÖ Fast, saves lives ‚ùå Freedom decreases

advisors.name: Legal Advisor
advisors.text: Targeted and transparent communication is better than restriction. ‚úÖ Increases trust ‚ùå Slower

advisors.name: Academic
advisors.text: Start a media literacy campaign. ‚úÖ Increases trust ‚ùå Weak effect during crisis

advisors.name: IT Specialist
advisors.text: Send direct alerts to phones (cell-broadcast). ‚úÖ Fast ‚ùå Coordination is hard

action_cards.name: Active Info Intervention
action_cards.tooltip:
Use counter-troll teams to debunk fake maps.
Pros (+): Misinfo drops fast.
Cons (‚àí): Freedom feels lower.

action_cards.name: Use Technology
action_cards.tooltip:
Send phone alerts, collaborate with platforms.
Pros (+): Fast info, freedom safe.
Cons (‚àí): Technical coordination needed.

action_cards.name: Media & NGO Collab
action_cards.tooltip:
Share independent news, start literacy campaign.
Pros (+): High trust, freedom friendly.
Cons (‚àí): Slow.

forest_fire.immediate_text: Your solution is live. Evacuations sped up. Complaints about internet outages exist.
forest_fire.delayed_text: Fire contained, fake map impact reduced by 50%. Some citizens complain about restrictions.

pandemic.title: Pandemic Outbreak
pandemic.story: A new virus is spreading. Fake cures and conspiracy theories are circulating. **Mission**: Ensure public access to reliable info, stop misinformation, and prevent collapse.

advisors.name: Health Expert
advisors.text: Create an anonymous map tracking movements. ‚úÖ Slows spread ‚ùå Privacy debates

advisors.name: IT Specialist
advisors.text: Detect and correct fake cures instantly. ‚úÖ Misinfo drops fast ‚ùå Censorship fears

advisors.name: Legal Advisor
advisors.text: Declare restrictions transparently. ‚úÖ Safety ensured ‚ùå Excessive restrictions harm trust

advisors.name: Educator
advisors.text: Use mobile games to teach hygiene. ‚úÖ Long-term awareness ‚ùå Slow effect

action_cards.name: Lifestyle Intervention
action_cards.tooltip:
Interactive map showing risky areas.
Pros (+): Safe movement, less spread.
Cons (‚àí): Privacy restricted.

action_cards.name: Local Cooperation
action_cards.tooltip:
Local info network via community leaders.
Pros (+): Fast response.
Cons (‚àí): Hard coordination.

action_cards.name: Info Campaign
action_cards.tooltip:
Educate on fake cures.
Pros (+): Long-term effect.
Cons (‚àí): Slow.

pandemic.immediate_text: Your choice is active: {}. Health warnings spreading. Some areas still have access issues.
pandemic.delayed_text: Fake cures reduced by 60%. Public more aware, health services running better.
